survey_name: Adoption and Usage of AI-Powered Mental Wellness Apps Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand user adoption, satisfaction, and feature preferences for AI-powered mental wellness applications to guide future product development.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use AI-powered mental wellness apps?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button format for clear response capture. Ensure options are mutually exclusive.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use AI-powered mental wellness apps?

questions.question_text: Which of the following features do you value most in AI-powered mental wellness apps? (Select up to 3)
questions.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Several times a week', or 'Once a week' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-select checkbox format with a limit of 3 selections. Randomize option order to reduce bias.

script.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Several times a week', or 'Once a week' in Q1

questions.question_text: What improvements would make you use AI-powered mental wellness apps more frequently?
